name: Kali silicatum

Gastric: Weight in stomach after eating, nausea, pain, flatulence
Head: Head congested, blood surges from body to head
Feeble will power
Absent-minded, anxious, indolent, timid
Vertigo, coldness of head; photophobia
Nasal catarrh, discharge bloody, excoriating, offensive nose, swollen, ulcerated

details: A deep-acting remedy. Lassitude is very marked. Desire to lie down all the time. Emaciation. Gouty nodosities
